attributes.action: Stop giving benefits to those who choose not to work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are so many people out there claiming benefits such as job seekers allowance, that are claiming this money because they simply cannot be bothered to go to work and earn money like the rest of us.

These people go down to there local job centre and sign on every week, taking money, which could be spent on a lot of other things.

Benefits should be given to those who are unable to work, no to those who choose not to work.

The most important factor here is that so much money which is coming from the government, and handed out to lazy people, could be spent on public transport or improving the police forces or equipment for schools or roads....the list is endless.

Thank you

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/nomorebenefits/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
